summary: This document is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) personnel and contractors regarding the preparation and sending of a supplemental discovery production to the defense counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell. It discusses logistical details like date changes, file conversions, and the inclusion of surveillance video footage.

persons.name: Everdell
persons.context: Mentioned as the recipient of a recent letter to which the prosecution's cover letter must respond.

connections.description: M is part of the prosecution team preparing discovery for Maxwell's defense, led by attorney Everdell.

events.title: Discovery Letter Date Update
events.description: The date on a discovery cover letter is updated before the materials are sent to defense counsel.

events.title: Discovery Production Preparation
events.description: Final preparations for a supplemental discovery production, including converting video footage and Excel spreadsheets, and drafting a cover letter.

events.title: Advance Notice of Supplemental Discovery
events.description: The prosecution team notifies contractors of an upcoming supplemental discovery production containing audio files that may have issues.

keyFacts: The prosecution was preparing a supplemental discovery production for Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team in April 2021.
The production included PBPD (Palm Beach Police Department) surveillance video footage that needed conversion to a viewable format.
The production also included American Express (Amex) records that had been received and processed.
A cover letter was being drafted to respond to a recent letter from defense attorney Everdell.
Files were to be delivered to the defense via an FTP site, and Excel spreadsheets were to be converted to PDFs.
